casebody.data:
James Norman RICHARDSON, Employee.
v.
PCS PHOSPHATE COMPANY, Inc. (fka Elf Aquitaine, fka Texas Gulf), Employer. ACE USA/ESIS, Zurich North America Insurance Co., Federal Insurance Company/Chubb Group, RSK Co. (k/n/a CNA), Specialty Risk Services, and Broadspire, Carriers. No. 38P15. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Aug. 20, 2015. Michael B. Pross, Salisbury, for Richardson, James Norman. Winston L. Page, Jr., Raleigh, for Zurich North America Insurance Co. Tracey L. Jones, Raleigh, for CNA (k/n/a). J. Gregory Newton, Raleigh, for ACE USA/ESIS. Jaye E. Bingham-Hinch, for ACE USA/ESIS. Harmony Taylor, Charlotte, for Federal Insurance Company, et al. John F. Morris, Charlotte, for Specialty Risk Services. William A. Oden, III, Wilmington, for PCS Phosphate Company, Inc., et al. Jordan A. Benton, Charlotte. J. Timothy Wilson, Raleigh. Lindsey L. Smith, Charlotte. Leslie P. Lasher, Raleigh, for CNA (k/n/a). M. Pierce Sandwith, Raleigh, for PCS Phosphate Company, Inc., et al. Erin F. Taylor, Charlotte, for ACE USA/ESIS.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 20th of January 2015 by Defendants (PCS Phosphate Company, Inc. and Broadspire) in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 20th of August 2015."
